definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">Player right clicks with item</field><next><block type="shoot_arrow"><field name="rangeditem">Arrow</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
